protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for gonadotropin releasing hormone (GnRH) that mediates the action of GnRH to stimulate the secretion of the gonadotropic hormones luteinizing hormone (LH) and follicle- stimulating hormone (FSH). This receptor mediates its action by association with G-proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system. Isoform 2 may act as an inhibitor of GnRH-R signaling

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
